mapper.update: update qcomment set comment_contents = #{commentContents}, comment_date = now() where comment_no = #{commentNo}
update qboard set member_id = #{memberId}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_contents = #{boardContents}, board_date = now() where board_no= #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into qcomment( member_id, comment_contents, board_no, comment_date )values( #{memberId}, #{commentContents}, #{boardNo}, now() )
insert into qboard( member_id, board_title, board_contents, board_date )values( #{memberId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, now() )
mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, member_id as memberId, comment_no as commentNo, comment_contents as commentContents, comment_date as commentDate from qcomment where comment_no=#{commentNo}
